text: Martina Lončar (born 18 July 1997) is a Canadian-born Croatian footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Croatia women's national team. ==Career== Lončar has been capped for the Croatia national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian women's soccer players Category:Colgate Raiders women's soccer players Category:Croatian women's footballers Category:Croatia women's international footballers Category:Soccer people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Mississauga Category:Women's association football midfielders
title: Martina Lončar
